column5: I guess I’d better buy a lottery ticket.  I was out deer hunting Saturday with my Dad, and shot another deer.  This was a spike buck. Photos to come once I finish off the role of film.  I just got a bow from a friend to use for the rest of the season.  Does anyone know if I can buy an additional deer tag still.  Fire up the Grill & Plug in the 2nd Freezer !! It's Hunting Season !! Entropy  ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++    Got My First Deer Yesterday !!  I managed to leave work at a fair time yesterday and got to my deer hunting grounds.  I was there for an hour watching 2 fields.  One I have permission to hunt and the other I do not.  I was keeping my attention on the field which I had permission to hunt and then all of a sudden a deer shows up in the next field!  It took her about 10 seconds to move on and she was on legal ground!!   I lined the shot up but at first did not have a safe backstop  so I lowered my shotgun and then she was gone, and reappeared just past a small clump of trees, now with a perfect backstop.  I had the backstop, a good ‘vitals shot’ and took it.  Success! She quickly went down.  I’ll post the pics once I get them off the 35 mm film.  Fire up the Grill, It’s Hunting Season !! Entropy
Well done,another sucessfull hunt,congrats !!!!! so what time is dinner...yummmy deer roast !!!! looking forward to seeing your pics..   buck or doe????cheers
Congrats!  Nice to see that patience paid off for you!
Congratulations! I saw your post on the huntontario message board, too.
Way to go, Start the BBQ. Venison is great cooked in the ice hut on the wood stove.
Thanks guys,  I should have the chops back sometime next week.
Congrats on getting your first deer. Good for you on waiting for the perfect shot
WTG on your first deer!  Now we have to wait for the pics.
Good for you E.  Looking forward to your pics.  Chris.
WTG... The Adrenalin rush ya get is something like nothing else... Now to get the beauty perfect 10 pointer eh!
congrats on your first deer can't wait to see the pictures  rob
congrats on the first deer, you will never forget this one no matter how many or how big the next ones are. good job,   jason
It has been a good season.
